name: apl.de.ap
description: '''Allan Pineda Lindo''' (born November 28, 1974), known professionally as '''apl.de.ap''' ({{IPAc-en|IPA|ˌ|æ|p|əl|d|i|ˈ|æ|p}} {{respell|AP|əl|dee|AP}}), is a Filipino and American musician. He is a founding member of the hip hop group [[Black Eyed Peas]] (BEP). With the BEP, he has been nominated for 16 [[Grammy Awards]]; the band won six awards, including [[Best Pop Vocal Album]].
